#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int no_of_digit(int num)
{
    int ctr=0;
    while(num)
    {
        num/=10;
        ctr++;
    }
    return ctr;
}
int digit_sum(int num)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(num)
    {
        sum+=(num%10);
        num/=10;
    }
    return sum;
}
int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int num, len, i;
        scanf("%d", &num);
        len=no_of_digit(num);
        len=min(9*len, num);
        bool flag=false;
        for(i=len;i>=1;i--)
        {
            if(digit_sum(num-i)+(num-i)==num)
            {
                flag=true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag)
            printf("%d\n", num-i);
        else
            printf("NONE\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
